report.title: Notifications list for warehouse user
report.description: A general purpose list of notifications, filtered by warehouse user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM notifications n LEFT JOIN occurrences o ON o.id=n.linked_id AND n.source='Verifications and comments' #joins# WHERE n.acknowledged=false and n.user_id=#user_id# and (o.training=#training# or o.id is null) #order_by#

param.name: source_types
param.description: Comma separated list of source types with each item single quoted, or blank to allow all. Options are 'T' (trigger), 'C' (comment), 'V' (verification), 'A' (automated record check), 'S' (species alert), 'VT' (verification task), 'AC' (achievement).
param.join: JOIN notifications n2 on n2.id=n.id and n2.source_type in (#source_types#)

param.name: system_name
param.description: Name to display instead of admin for system generated notifications
